title: social network api
text: An API for a social network web application where users can share their thoughts, react to friends thoughts, and create a friend list.

title: GOSSIPPYY
text: A Facebook-style social media application that allows logged in users to share posts and comments with friends.

title: employee tracker
text: A command-line application from scratch to manage a company's employee database, using Node.js, Inquirer, and MySQL.

title: buzzbuzz
text: A Buzzfeed-style quiz application that allows logged in users to take the featured quiz of the day.
